serialTasks.description: Prime 'sudo' at the beginning for unattended install

parallelTasks.description: Add docker aptitude repo for Ubuntu 'focal'
parallelTasks.bashCommandLine: echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu focal stable" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list

parallelTasks.description: Add some aliases and such to ~/.bashrc file
parallelTasks.bashCommandLine: { echo "alias h='history'" ; echo "alias d='docker'" ; echo "alias x='xrae-core'" ; echo "shopt -s dotglob" ; echo "set -o vi" ; } | tee -a ~/.bashrc

parallelTasks.description: Create script to enable 'git' credential caching
parallelTasks.bashCommandLine: { echo "#!/usr/bin/env bash" ; echo "git config --global credential.helper store" ; } | tee ~/_cache-git-credentials.sh

parallelTasks.description: Show line number when using vi(m)

parallelTasks.bashCommandLine: echo "${USER} ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" | sudo EDITOR='tee -a' visudo

serialTasks.description: Add apt-fast to speed apt-get - Step 1
serialTasks.bashCommandLine: { echo "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/apt-fast/stable/ubuntu focal main" ; echo "deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/apt-fast/stable/ubuntu focal main" ; } | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/apt-fast.list

serialTasks.description: Add apt-fast to speed apt-get - Step 2
Add apt-fast to speed apt-get - Step 3
serialTasks.bashCommandLine: sudo apt-get update ; sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y apt-fast

parallelTasks.bashCommandLine: sudo apt-fast install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io git openssh-server
